channel.title: Writing Samples (more available upon request) on Thanks for visiting VeronicaStarovoit.com!
channel.description: Recent content in Writing Samples (more available upon request) on Thanks for visiting VeronicaStarovoit.com!

item.title: Amazon Advertising Help Center
item.description: Amazon Advertising help center owned and maintained by Veronica Starovoit. Most content was written by her in collaboration with product managers, partner managers, and other subject matter experts. Maintained using a Middleman static site generator. Initiatives she ran to improve it included: launching Japanese localization working with the UX Design team to redesign the experience PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Amazon Advertising Conversion Attribution
item.description: Explaining a technical, proprietary concept. This was part of the Amazon Advertising help center owned and maintained by Veronica Starovoit. Most content was written by her in collaboration with product managers, engineers, and other subject matter experts. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Amazon Pages UI Copy Feedback
item.description: Pages is an Amazon product where advertisers can create custom landing pages for their products and brands on the Amazon retail site. The following document includes UI copy feedback provided by Veronica to the UX Designer and Software Engineer for Pages. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Amazon Promotion Document
item.description: Veronica presented the following document as evidence for a promotion from L5 Tech Writer to L6 Sr. Tech Writer at Amazon, which she got. In it, she describes key achievements and provides positive peer and customer feedback. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Pearson Documentation and UX Writing Style Guide
item.description: Editorial style guide adopted by the Pearson Schoolnet Technical Writing team. Created by Veronica. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Pearson Global Platform Services API
item.description: An excerpt of content from a larger set about the Pearson Global Platform Services APIs. Veronica was the sole technical writer on this project and collaborated with engineers, product managers, and other cross-functional teams to produce this manual. PDF can’t be displayed :(

item.title: Pearson Schoolnet Release Notes
item.description: What’s new with Educator Development. Fully prepared by Veronica (who was the sole writer for this product line). PDF can’t be displayed :(
